author: McGill University - Desautels Faculty of Management
content:
Join us on Wednesday to learn how McGill Master of Management in Analytics (MMA) students have been partnering with community, social services, and SME organizations to review their data and analytics needs and develop strategies that can help partners solve their pressing analytics problems! 

Register here by 4 PM tomorrow: http://ow.ly/QgxU50HCQz7

Shoeb Hosain, Program Director of the MMA Program, will be hosting this one-hour info session about the types of projects we can do and give examples of what we’ve done in the past!

author: Catherine Rana
author_info: Director of Programs and Services, The Federation of Community Social Services of BC
content: How can we bring about transformational change in all areas of child and youth mental health in BC? Join colleagues from across the province and BC's Representative for Children and Youth for a day of learning, planning, and change-making. Registration for The Federation of Community Social Services of BC's 2022 Social Policy Forum is now open: https://lnkd.in/gds--Jdn

author: Jobberman Nigeria
content: Companies including Dangote Cement  and Jobberman (Third Party Recruitment) are hiring for Community & Social Services Jobs right now.👉

author: United Nations Volunteers
content:
✔️Do you have solid work experience in direct social work with children in need of care and protection and their families and communities?
✔️Experience working with government statutory child protection services/government child, family, and community social services?

#UNICEF is recruiting a UN Volunteers (International Specialist) to serve as Child Protection Technical Specialist (Social Welfare) in Honiara, Solomon Islands. Apply by 30 March 2021
https://lnkd.in/dSx8bPP
#SolomonIslands #UNV #ChildProtection #Volunteering

author: Catherine Rana
author_info: Director of Programs and Services, The Federation of Community Social Services of BC
content: There are still two months left to apply for our Community Social Services Training Fund! The Training Fund helps BC social service organizations access the training and development they most need. The application deadline is Mar. 31, 2022 and backfill funding is available. Learn more at https://lnkd.in/gAtbpaVd #training #funding

author: Moe Hammoud
content: After many years implementing #Workday and ERP systems, I am excited to share that I have branched out to Independent consulting.  We have a very strong team of high level Functional and Technical Architects to help Workday clients be successful through their transformation journey. More to follow in the coming months! Please get in touch and chat! #workday #workdayfinancials #workdayhcm #consulting

author: Lachlan Bradly
author_info: Customer, Brand and Marketing Senior Consultant at KPMG Australia
content:
I’m happy to share that I’m starting a new position as Senior Consultant at KPMG Australia! 

My time as a consultant allowed me to work on many amazing and meaningful projects all across Australia, allowing me to learn, grow and expand on my skillset. I look forward to this next chapter as a Senior Consultant, working alongside my amazing Customer Brand and Marketing team in Canberra and our broader national team!
